name: IoT | Android things
description: Εισαγωγή στον κόσμο του Android Things. | Αίθουσα Συνεδρίων 1ος όροφος | Ομιλητή: Γιώργος Κορτσαρίδης (GDG)

name: Study Jams | README.md
description:
Join us for our meetup and learn everything you want to know about our Study Jams free courses on Android Development and Analytics A/B testing.
As well we are rolling out the certificates of our previous Android IoT during this coming week, if you want them earlier, by coming tomorrow you will access your GDG folder with your certificate.
Ps. If you can't make tomorrow you will receive an email for accessing your folder and your certificates.
We will meet at the same place as our previous kick-off meetup

name: STUDY JAMS
description:
Google Developers Study Jams is a free series of global, community-run, in-person study groups. The current Study Jams series is presented in partnership with the City College and will follow Udacity Android Development for Beginners and Problem Solving with Advanced Analytics courses + A/B Testing. The series will be led by Certified Google Developers Experts and will lead to Udacity Certification.

Android Development for Beginners

This course is part of the Android Basics Nanodegree by Google. Learn the basics of Android and Java programming, and take the first step on your journey to becoming an Android developer!

Problem Solving with Advanced Analytics - A/B Testing

The Problem Solving with Analytics course provides students with the foundational knowledge to use data analytics to create business insights. as well as how to choose and characterize metrics to evaluate your experiments, how to design an experiment with enough statistical power, how to analyze the results and draw valid conclusions, and how to ensure that the the participants of your experiments are adequately protected.

No programming experience required ... we will start from scratch!

IMPORTANT : You need to pre-register yourself here as well
how_to_find_us: Auditorium - 5th floor

name: GOOGLE DESIGN SPRINT | NASA Challenge
description:
During the Women Techmakers event this weekend we will host a NASA Design Sprint aiming at solving a big problem astronauts are facing when in space: loosing their objects/forgetting where they left them.We are calling all developers with specializations in Wireless technologies, Bluetooth, Machine Learning to join for this NASA Design sprint and become the leaders of their teams and for everybody to join us and share their ideas!If you are interested RSVP here and send us a message on what you would like to "take care" of ;-) ... Soon we will update more info

And do come to our Women Techmakers Summit this weekend. Register here
how_to_find_us: Anagnostakis Hall

name: 2nd THESS CODE FESTIVAL
description:
Κατά τη διάρκεια του διημέρου θα διεξάγονται εργαστήρια για όλες τις ηλικιακές ομάδες και ενδιαφέροντα των μαθητών. Παράλληλα, οι μαθητές θα έχουν τη δυνατότητα να γνωρίσουν τις διαδικασίες και το αντικείμενο του Πανελλήνιου Διαγωνισμού Πληροφορικής (ΠΔΠ) καθώς και να συνομιλήσουν με Έλληνες Ολυμπιονίκες του ΠΔΠ προηγούμενων ετών.

Οι μαθητές θα έχουν τη ευκαιρία να προγραμματίσουν σε διαφορετικές τεχνολογίες, να δημιουργήσουν τις δικές τους πραγματικές εφαρμογές και να εφαρμόσουν λύσεις πληροφορικής σε αντικείμενα όπως τα παιχνίδια, το IoT, mobile apps, μόδα και τη ρομποτική.

For more info: http://code.epy-mathra.gr/

name: GDG DevFest Greece 2017
description:

For the full agenda please visit our official site: https://heraklion.googledevelopers.gr/

• What to bring

• Important to know
Please register to eventbrite

name: [ IWD WTM Greece] | Women Techmakers Greece Summit 18 | Building a New Horizon
description:
This is our annual meetup to interact, meet new and old friends (men and women), highlight our needs and achievements, learn about new opportunities and get inspired, create synergies and build all together the future we want, a future of equal opportunities to all.

For the latest updates and the final agenda with speakers, please visit our site https://womentechmakers.gr The event will be open & free to public, registration is obligatory

For RSVP and more info please refer to the official Meetup of WTM Greece: http://bit.ly/wtm18GR

name: Google Cloud Study Jam
description:
***[UPDATE]***

Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?

Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.
Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers.
For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.
Agenda (Tempted):

5:00pm: Three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs
6:00pm: Break
6:30pm: Intro to Docker or Scientific Data Processing lab
7:30pm: Event ends

Stay tuned as we will update the venue! We are organizing this meetup within the frame of the Women Techmakers Greece Summit 2018 ...and everybody is invited to join!
how_to_find_us: I4GPro offered its awesome spaces!

name: F.R.I.D.A.Y | Personal Assistant | Lab.01
description:
Inspired by Tony Stark's F.R.I.D.A.Y. we will host a series of Labs focused on Machine Learning | AI and Voice Integration.
Today's LAB.01 Agenda:
- Welcome & Intro
- Structure of the Labs (from Lab.01 to Lab.05)
- Technology and its position in the market
- Objectives of the series of Labs and team forming
- Intro on the Tools to be used
Python & Python Models - TensorFlow - GPGPU and why - toy examples
of a Neural Net

name: F.R.I.D.A.Y | Personal Assistant | Lab.02
description:
**BRING YOUR OWN LAPTOP**

Inspired by Tony Stark's F.R.I.D.A.Y. we will host a series of Labs focused on Machine Learning | AI and Voice Integration.
Today's Lab.02 agenda :
In depth AI, NLP, speech recognition, Tech to date, 'n' a bit of science, State of the art solutions

name: F.R.I.D.A.Y | Personal Assistant | Lab.03
description:
Inspired by Tony Stark's F.R.I.D.A.Y we will host a series of labs focused on Machine Learning | AI and Voice Integration.
Today's Lab.03 agenda :
Create groups and start working on the prototypes.
Prerequisites :
* Download and install : tensorflow, python, keras, numpy
* Understand and execute code on : https://github.com/melidisc/AI-Lab/tree/master/Lab02

name: F.R.I.D.A.Y. | Lab.04 + Special Google I/O Extended edition
description:
This week's Lab.04 will meet Google I/O Extended, join us for code + viewparty!

Today's Lab.04 agenda :
Complete coding our own assistant.

An introduction on Visual User Interface

And in occasion of the Google I/O happening in San Francisco 8-10 of May, we will prolong our stay and view the keynote + an interesting talk on Google Assistant.

At the end of the evening we will give raffle some goodies (T-Shirts, USBs, pen-pads, ...) ...and a nice surprise for all....if the supporter allow us ;-)

name: F.R.I.D.A.Y. | Lab.05
description: Time to showcase our own Virtual Assistant projects!

name: Data, ML, AI | Google Cloud Study Jam series

venue.name: The University of Sheffield International Faculty, CITY College

description:
Digital Analytics ( https://www.meetup.com/Digital-Analytics-Meetup-Thessaloniki/ ) & GDG Thessaloniki joins forces to fly you into Google Cloud with a series of Study Jams.
We will provide, thanks to City College support, desktops/PCs, just bring your willing to learn and enthusiasm ;)
We will start with Data, ML and AI, in case you can't join us, do not worry we will replicate a few jams, based on the interest/person you showed us.
In case you RSVP but at the end you can't join us, please remove your booking so to be able to give it to someone else.

UPDATED AGENDA:

06:00PM | Welcome + Open Intro (open to everybody)
For the 35 Jammers (who got the badge at the reception upon their arrival)
06:35PM | Free access to Qwiklabs and Setup
06:45PM | Lab 1: Introduction to SQL
07:15PM | Lab 2: BigQuery Qwik Start
07:45PM | Lab 3: Google Cloud Speech API
08:10PM | Break
08:20PM | Lab 4: Cloud ML Engine
09:00PM | Lab 5: Google Genomics
09:35PM | Event ends

This is a beginner series of Jams, we will learn together.
For more info pls visit: http://bit.ly/2S0oJs1
how_to_find_us: Ask the reception for the Cloud Study Jams

name: Data, ML, AI | Google Cloud Study Jam series | Part 2

venue.name: The University of Sheffield International Faculty, CITY College

description:
2 Part of this Study Jam session.
IMPORTANT NOTICE:
We set the meetup capacity at a maximum 35 people, with a waiting list and here is why:
1. If you RSVP within the first 35 people you do not need to bring your laptop (we will provide desktops at the Lab)
2. If you are on a waiting list you will have to bring your laptop.
We decided to do so, in order to be able to satisfy everybody joining us, as we had lots of requests.

As people might cancel their RSVP, we will send a confirmation message the previous day as a reminder, so check your inbox for either "Bring your laptop" or "You are in, no need for laptop"

PS. If you can't come please update your availability here on meetup, so to be able to free a spot.

This Study Jam is proudly offered to you by Digital Analytics ( https://www.meetup.com/Digital-Analytics-Meetup-Thessaloniki/ ) & GDG Thessaloniki

AGENDA:

06:30PM | Welcome
06:35PM | Free access to Qwiklabs and Setup
06:45PM | Lab 1: Introduction to SQL
07:15PM | Lab 2: BigQuery Qwik Start
07:45PM | Lab 3: Google Cloud Speech API
08:10PM | Break
08:20PM | Lab 4: Cloud ML Engine
09:00PM | Lab 5: Google Genomics
09:35PM | Beeralizing (don't plan & don't run, we will go all together for beers + socializing)

This is a beginner series of Jams, we will learn together.
how_to_find_us: Ask the reception for the Cloud Study Jams
